U_ENT_PORTAL_PARAMS.Name: ENT - Alow Oveflow of Available Qty in Local Company
ENT - Alow Oveflow of Available Qty in Group (ALL Companies)

UDViewsMetadata.DEFINITION:
CREATE VIEW "ENT_ItemBP_Prices" ( "CardCode","CardName","ItemCode","ItemName","Lvl_30_Price_StandardList","Lvl_20_Price_ItemGroupBP","Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount1","Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount2","Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount3","Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount4","Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_DiscountFinal","Lvl_10_ItemBP_Price","Lvl_10_ItemBP_DiscountFinal","SpecialPrice","PriceOrigin" ) as SELECT "CardCode" , "CardName" , "ItemCode" , "ItemName" , "Lvl_30_Price_StandardList" , "Lvl_20_Price_ItemGroupBP" , "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount1" , "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount2" , "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount3" , "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount4" , "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_DiscountFinal" , "Lvl_10_ItemBP_Price" , "Lvl_10_ItemBP_DiscountFinal" , coalesce("Lvl_10_ItemBP_Price",
	 "Lvl_20_Price_ItemGroupBP","Lvl_30_Price_StandardList")
	  AS "SpecialPrice" , Case 
	 when "Lvl_10_ItemBP_Price" is not null then '10_ItemBP'
	 when "Lvl_20_Price_ItemGroupBP" is not null then '20_ItemGroupBP'
	 when "Lvl_30_Price_StandardList" is not null then '30_StandardList'
	 else ''
	 END as "PriceOrigin" from (SELECT
	 T0."CardCode",
	 T0."CardName",
	T1."ItemCode" ,
	T1."ItemName",
	T10."Price" AS "Lvl_30_Price_StandardList" -- generic price for all BPs
 ,
	T10."Price"*((100-T3."U_sc1")/100*(100-T3."U_sc2")/100*(100-T3."U_sc3")/100*(100-T3."U_sc4")/100) AS "Lvl_20_Price_ItemGroupBP" -- special price for BP-ItemGroup  -- TODO Final Calculation of discount
,
	T3."U_sc1" AS "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount1" -- special discount 1 for BP-ItemGroup
,
	T3."U_sc2" AS "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount2" -- special discount 1 for BP-ItemGroup
,
	T3."U_sc3" AS "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount3" -- special discount 1 for BP-ItemGroup
,
	T3."U_sc4" AS "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_Discount4" -- special discount 1 for BP-ItemGroup
,
	100-100*(100-T3."U_sc1")/100*(100-T3."U_sc2")/100*(100-T3."U_sc3")/100*(100-T3."U_sc4")/100 AS "Lvl_20_ItemGroupBP_DiscountFinal" -- final discount for BP-ItemGroup -- TODO final calculation
--80/100*84/100*100/100*100/100
,
	T2."Price" AS "Lvl_10_ItemBP_Price" -- special price for BP-Item
,
	T2."Discount" AS "Lvl_10_ItemBP_DiscountFinal" -- discount for BP-Item (just to show it if needed)
 
FROM OCRD T0 join OITM T1 ON 1=1 
LEFT JOIN ITM1 T10 ON T10."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" 
AND T10."PriceList"=1 
LEFT JOIN OSPP T2 ON T2."CardCode"=T0."CardCode" 
AND T2."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" 
LEFT JOIN "@SCONTI_BP_GR_ART" T3 ON T3."U_codicebp"=T0."CardCode" 
AND T3."U_codgrart"=T1."ItmsGrpCod") WITH READ ONLY
